locations.name: Marina Bay Sands
locations.description: Iconic Singapore resort with a distinctive three-tower design, featuring a sky park, luxury accommodations, a casino, and stunning city views from its infinity pool.

locations.name: Sentosa Island
locations.description: Singapore's resort getaway with theme parks, beaches, and entertainment, including Universal Studios and S.E.A. Aquarium. Accessible by cable car or bridge, it's a premier destination for leisure and recreation.

locations.name: Botanic Gardens
locations.description: A historic green oasis with diverse plant collections, including the UNESCO-listed National Orchid Garden. A popular destination for serene walks and natural beauty in the heart of the city.

locations.name: Chinatown
locations.description: vibrant cultural hub, blending traditional architecture, bustling markets, and authentic eateries. With iconic temples like Sri Mariamman, it offers a rich blend of Chinese heritage and modern charm.

locations.name: Orchard Road
locations.description: Singapore's top shopping and entertainment district, featuring upscale malls, designer boutiques, and diverse dining options. A dynamic hub for fashion and culinary experiences in the heart of the city.
